mapper.sql: fish_id, fish_name, fish_probability, fish_value, is_special, special_group
mapper.select: select fish_value from bot_game_fishing where fish_id = #{fishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from bot_game_fishing order by fish_probability asc
select fish_name from bot_game_fishing where fish_id = #{fishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.update:
update bot_game_fishing
fish_name = #{fishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fish_probability = #{fishProbability,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fish_value = #{fishValue,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_special = #{isSpecial,jdbcType=BIT},
special_group = #{specialGroup,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where fish_id = #{fishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bot_game_fishing set fish_name = #{fishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fish_probability = #{fishProbability,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fish_value = #{fishValue,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_special = #{isSpecial,jdbcType=BIT}, special_group = #{specialGroup,jdbcType=BIGINT} where fish_id = #{fishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
